games.title: Castlevania: Curse of Darkness
games.notes: Runs at full speed with minor dips in performance and minor graphical issues

games.title: Castlevania: Lament of Innocence
games.notes: Hard locks when interacting with save menu, has major graphical glitches with any save box

games.title: Hot Wheels Stunt Track Challenge
games.notes: Runs at very low speed with a lot of dips in performance
